title: Sidewall, 1840s
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Diaper pattern composed of ribbon and bosses with inset, stylized pink leaf and shadow. Optical effect created by alternating light and dark bands of printed ornament.  Printed in black, olive and dark green, on a dark green ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1840s.
1840s. Block-printed on continuous paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-195.
